Annotation Artifacts
An
Annotation
is a text that helps the developer of the business process (BP) model to enter additional information. This information will remain available to users (typically to administrators or analysts responsible for configuration) working with business flow charts on the platform (for more information, refer to
Setting up business process flow charts
).
To enter a comment, select the icon
in the action bar of the custom item. Then enter the necessary comment (text).
